hero.name: Alexandre Laborde
hero.title: Web & Mobile Developer
hero.description: A mobile and web developer and computer science student at Epitech. I'm all about diving into the realms of well designed Mobile apps and UI.

mobile.title: Mobile Projects
mobile.description: Native and cross-platform iOS and Android apps

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: My own portfolio website! Built with Next.js 14, React Three Fiber for 3D graphics, and GSAP for smooth animations.

nolosay.title: Nolosay
nolosay.description: Showcase website for Nolosay, an innovative accessibility platform. Modern UI/UX design with RedwoodJS.

github.title: More Projects...
github.description: Explore more of my work on GitHub! From React Native apps to Swift projects, discover the full range of my skills.

todolist.title: To Do List
todolist.description: A native iOS task management app built with Swift and SwiftUI. Persistent storage with Firebase.

flashcard.title: Flashcard!
flashcard.description: Educational iOS app for creating and studying with custom flashcards. Swift and Firebase for real-time sync.

mybikerental.title: MyBikeRental
mybikerental.description: Cross-platform recreation of the Bicloo bike rental app from Nantes. React Native with real-time availability and mapping.

flashy.title: Flashy
flashy.description: Modern iOS flashcard app with offline-first design and cloud marketplace. Built with SwiftUI, SwiftData, and Firebase featuring 3D flip animations and quiz mode.

cryptix.title: Cryptix
cryptix.description: iOS finance app with currency converter and cryptocurrency viewer. Neumorphic design with real-time exchange rates and interactive price charts.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A developer passionate about creating digital experiences
about.bio: Hey there! I'm Alexandre Laborde, a mobile and web developer and computer science student at Epitech. I'm all about diving into the realms of well designed Mobile apps and UI. It's my true passion, and I aspire to make it my full-time gig in the future!
about.diplome: Expert in Information Technologies Master Degree - 2021 - 2025
about.diplomeDescription: Computer Science formation focusing on software engineering, systems architectures and project managment.
about.bacDescription: End of highschool degree. Bac S option Engineer Sciences and Computer Sciences
